channel.title: Pages on Julian Carrasquillo
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Julian Carrasquillo

item.title: Julian Carrasquillo
item.description: An experienced business analyst in the outdoor industry and currently working towards a Master’s degree in Data Science. Skilled in R, I have a focus in the tidyverse set of packages. Excels in data visualization, insight building, and tool development. This platform is to connect with others, share methods, and explore opportunities. Check out the blog to see some of my recent projects. This site was made by me using Yihui Xie’s Blogdown package.

item.title: Resume
item.description: SKILLS STATISTICS High aptitude in regression modeling & prediction methods for multivariate & categorical data analysis. Versed in other machine learning methods including decision trees, k-means clustering, & principal component analysis. Demonstrated core understanding by passing SOA professional actuarial exams Probability P/1 & Financial Mathematics FM/2, assessments with historical passing rates less than 40%. PROGRAMMING Established R user, aligning with the Tidyverse set of packages for data importing, wrangling, analysis, and visualization.
